title: Major T-Mobile outage takes down account access, mobile app
description: A major T-Mobile outage is currently preventing customers from logging into their accounts and from using the company's mobile app. [...]

title: Framework discloses data breach after accountant gets phished
description: Framework Computer disclosed a data breach exposing the personal information of an undisclosed number of customers after Keating Consulting Group, its accounting service provider, fell victim to a phishing attack. [...]

title: Over 150k WordPress sites at takeover risk via vulnerable plugin
description: Two vulnerabilities impacting the POST SMTP Mailer WordPress plugin, an email delivery tool used by 300,000 websites, could help attackers take complete control of a site authentication. [...]

title: Halara probes breach after hacker leaks data for 950,000 people
description: Popular athleisure clothing brand Halara is investigating a data breach after the alleged data of almost 950,000 customers was leaked on a hacking forum. [...]

title: Microsoft testing Windows 11 USB 80Gbps support, Copilot on login
description: Microsoft is now testing support for the USB4 Version 2.0 specification in Windows 11, enabling transfer speeds of up to 80 Gbps over USB Type-C cables. [...]

title: Bitwarden adds passkey support to log into web password vaults
description: The open-source Bitwarden password manager has announced that all users can now log in to their web vaults using a passkey instead of the standard username and password pairs. [...]

title: Microsoft shares script to update Windows 10 WinRE with BitLocker fixes
description: Microsoft has released a PowerShell script to automate updating the Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE) partition in order to fix CVE-2024-20666, a vulnerability that allowed for BitLocker encryption bypass. [...]

title: New Balada Injector campaign infects 6,700 WordPress sites
description: A new Balada Injector campaign launched in mid-December has infected over 6,700 WordPress websites using a vulnerable version of the Popup Builder campaign. [...]

title: Finland warns of Akira ransomware wiping NAS and tape backup devices
description: The Finish National Cybersecurity Center (NCSC-FI) is informing of increased Akira ransomware activity in December, targeting companies in the country and wiping backups. [...]
